narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Applicant and facility meet all requirements to be licensed as a Class 'C' Exhibitor.
Applicant will mail license fee to the Western Regional Office.
Record-keeping requirements were explained to the applicant during this inspection.
Exit briefing conducted with the owner.
Additional Inspectors
Maxwell Kelly, Animal Care Inspector
